abilities.description: (PASSIVE)CARNIVOREWhenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
abilities.name: CARNIVOREW

abilities.description: (Q)RUPTURERuptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
abilities.name: RUPTURER

abilities.description: (W)FERAL SCREAMCho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
abilities.name: FERAL SCREAMC

abilities.description: (E)VORPAL SPIKESCho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
abilities.name: VORPAL SPIKESC

abilities.description: (R)FEASTDevours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
abilities.name: FEASTD
